table_description: Information about environment descriptions, including ID, name, project details, and associated resources.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the environment.

columns.name: projectId
columns.description: The ID of the project associated with the environment.

columns.name: databasesIds
columns.description: A list of database IDs associated with the environment.

columns.name: redisIds
columns.description: A list of Redis instance IDs associated with the environment.

columns.name: serviceIds
columns.description: A list of service IDs associated with the environment.

columns.name: envGroupIds
columns.description: A list of environment group IDs associated with the environment.

columns.name: protectedStatus
columns.description: The protected status of the environment.
